text: Barry Doyle Harris (December 15, 1929 â€“ December 8, 2021)Barry Harris, beloved jazz pianist devoted to bebop, dies at 91 was an American jazz pianist, bandleader, composer, arranger, and educator. He was known for his bebop style. Harris died on December 8, 2021 in North Bergen, New Jersey from problems caused by COVID-19, one week before his 92nd birthday. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in New Jersey Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pianists Category:American composers Category:American bandleaders Category:Educators from Detroit Category:Musicians from Detroit Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:Educators from New Jersey
title: Barry Harris
